nodes.text: Does the Minister believe that the Government should keep well under review on a regular basis their attitude towards nuclear power?
Our goal is to reduce the phenomena causing global warming
we know that a major accelerator is the emission of carbon dioxide and other carbon gases
British Energy has pointed out that the generation of about 64 TWh or 64000 GWh by its nuclear power stations avoids the production and generation of about 40 million tonnes of carbon dioxide.
The Prime Minister has described global warming as the most serious environmental threat to the planet
We do not want the disaster to happen
The best way to avoid the disaster is to try to restrict its causes
